sentences.en: Boxes are stacked in every nook and cranny at the factory.
sentences.cn: 箱子叠放在工厂的每个角落。

sentences.en: Life can be found in almost every nook and cranny of our planet Earth.
sentences.cn: 在地球的每一角落和缝隙几乎都存在生命。

sentences.en: A cranny plan as such kicked off the journey for American ginseng pill to rank the best seller.
sentences.cn: 就这一招“王婆卖瓜”计，打开了一洲洋参丸在本港的销路。
